For all those in need:
1. Make an alias of the installer and put it on your desktop.
2. Run the installer off your desktop and get to the point where it wants you to enter your name and serial number,etc and STOP - leave this screen up!
3. Bring up the folder that contains the patches.
4. Run the LogicStudio_Installer Patch.
5. Drag the screen where they want your serials over to the patch window and drop serial screen in the box, it should load and let you know everything's been patched.
6. Rerun the installer alias that you had originally needed serials for and if you don't need to enter that crap, you're good to go so far.
7. Where it asks you what you do & don't want to install, uncheck mainstage, because there is no patch for it.
8. Proceed to install.
9. Once installed, don't run it - go back to your patch folder and run the Logic Pro_9_Intel Patch.
10. With the patch window still up, open your finder and search for Logic Pro 9 and drag the file into the patch window.
11. Repeat previous steps with the remaining programs and you should be good to go. Enjoy.

P.S. Apple, this is for being a pain in the ass, fuck you.

TO FIX "PATCH NOT OPENING" PROBLEM:

If you double click on the "Installer Patch" and nothing happens (i.e. no app window opens), do the following:
1) Open a Terminal (under Applications/Utilities)
2) 'cd' to the 'Patch' folder of the torrent (generally this will be something like 'cd ~/Documents/Downloads/Logic*/Patch'). Once in this directory, if you type 'ls' you should see a list of various Patch.app directories and the REAME.txt
3) type the following command (you can use tab completion to avoid typing out each full directory name): 'chmod 755 */Contents/MacOS/iPatcher' 
4) go back to the Finder window & double-click the patch applications, & they should open.
^--disregard the 'tab completion' remark in step 3- that was written before I noticed that all patches were affected & changed the command to '*'

TRANSLATION OF WEBCHELLA'S INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS INTO AMERICAN-ENGLISH:

(NOTE: I am a translator. I am a new MAC user, and  am about to install Logic Pro 9. Any words that were unclear to me I put in brackets [ ].)

Installing Logic Studio 9:

   1. Load the Virtual Image "logicstudio.cdr"
   2. Right click on the Alias or Shortcut "Install Logic Studio"
   3. Copy "LogicStudio.mpkg", which just opened, to your desktop.
   4. Open the file "LogicStudio_noSN Installer Patch", that you downloaded with the cracks.
   5. Drag the file "LogicStudio.mpkg" that you copied to the Desktop, to the frame of the window that opened "LogicStudio_noSN Installer Patch". You will see the message "LogicStudio.mpkg has been successfully patched", confirming that the installer has been patched correctly.
   6. Start the Installation of the file "LogicStudio.mpkg" (on your desktop) but do not continue its installation.
   7. Now start the installation "Install Logic Studio" (ie: the "LogicStudio.mpkg" file), but this time from the loaded image "logicstudio.cdr".
   8. Close the install window that you started from your desktop (in step 6), and continue with the installation you began in step 7.
   9. It will not ask for any serial and you can install Logic Studio, no problem.

Includes Serial #’s for:
    Compressor 3.5
    Logic Pro 9
    Installer logicstudio
    Soundtrack Pro 3
    WaveBurner 1.6

Note: there is no crack yet available for the applications that are not included in this package.

The first time you start Logic Pro 9, Compressor 3.5, Soundtrack Pro 3, or WaveBurner 1.6 you need to patch the corresponding application launcher, as you did in steps 4 and 5, using the patches that correspond to each specific application. All of these are included in this package.

[END OF TRANSLATION OF WEBCHELLAS INSTALL INTRUCTIONS]

Snow Leopard 10.6.8. EASY METHOD to load Pro Logic 9.1.7 that WILL NOT ask for Serial #:
Use Webchella’s .iso, but don’t use the patches webchella provided. Instead:
FIRST: 
1)Make sure you have the latest “PRO KIT” (free from Apple/support).
2)Download and install crack [http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5635830/Logic_Studio_9.1.1_Pro_Apps_Crack].
3)Copy the contents of the crack into the folder [Macintosh HD(or whatever your volume name is)/Library/Application Support/ProApps], overwriting any old files with same names.
SECOND:
1.Download & unpack the Webchella  torrent [LogicStudio.iso]
2. Click [LogicStudio.iso] to install. 
3. Follow install instructions and select “Custom” installation when asked.
